sentences.english: I speak the pass-word primeval, I give the sign of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 我說出太古的暗語，我發出民主的信號。

sentences.english: He said the code and hung up.
sentences.chinese: 他說完暗語就掛上了電話。

sentences.english: The implication was that the writing was clearly on the wall for minor argots.
sentences.chinese: 言外之意是，刻畫在牆上的文字是一些微小的暗語。
